specs.notes: Google automatically tests combinations of headlines and descriptions to find the best performing ad variations
Auto-optimized by Google ML to fit any ad slot across the Display Network; supports both landscape (1200x628) and square (1200x1200) images
Skippable after 5 seconds; max 3 minutes; charged on CPV (cost per view) when viewer watches 30s or interacts
Thumbnail and headline shown in YouTube search results and related videos; user clicks to watch; max 3 minutes; charged when user clicks to watch
Product data fed from Google Merchant Center; image, title, price, and merchant name displayed; optimized for product comparison shopping
Auto-generated creatives from app store listing assets; Google ML optimizes placement across Search, Play, YouTube, Display, and Discover

specs.image_specs: Platform-native resolution, minimum 1080x1080px for feed posts
specs.video_specs: Platform-native format, 15s-60s recommended for feed, up to 3min for long-form
specs.caption: Influencer-written with brand-approved talking points

specs.style: Product reveal, authentic first reaction, detailed showcase
Real-time engagement, product demo, audience Q&A
Detailed honest opinion, pros and cons, personal experience
specs.disclosure: Required, clearly visible in post or first 30 seconds of video

recommendations: Reduce mobile bid - CTR significantly below desktop
Consider pausing Germany - CTR well below other markets
Shift budget from mobile to desktop placements

result.impact: Strong ROAS of 3.9x with 25 conversions in 30-day window. Recommend increasing budget.
